name: HeartiFi
description:
Play as signal that is connecting two people.

This game is a prototype and it is available for mobile and computer and made for Godot Wild Jam 21 (Theme - Connection)

FullScreen Mode available.

Mobile Users please choose Mobile in Device option in the Options menu

The Difficulty works and can be played in Slow , Normal or Speed.

My first ever 2D-Platformer Game.

Would love your feedback.

Bye.
